title: Accor announces hotel F1 celebrates its 30th anniversary!
text:
hotel F1 surrounds itself with partnerships that are as astute as the brand itself! 


Topito, a fun, unusual and useful site for users over 15 years of age, offers a “Top 10” on the theme of the anniversary every month from January. Discover them here! 

From the 22nd of May to the 19thof July, the telephone operator SOSH, travels with the brand: a space dedicated within Sosh Park allows the guests to wish hotelF1 a happy anniversary. 

Finally, birthdays also mean…presents! In association with Le Petit Futé, the French tourist guide has honoured hotelF1 throughout May, and has offered 1 000 digital tourist guides to the customers of the brand. 

“This year we’re celebrating our birthday everyday” 
The aim of the new fun and quirky communication campaign is to enhance the young, dynamic and straightforward personality of the brand structured around a 360° media plan in France: web, mobile and social. 
The TV ads are broadcasted to the general public websites such as Amazon, Cdiscount and MSN: there have already been no less than 120 million views! 
In particular, on hotelF1’s Facebook page which is updated daily the publications are full of fun and surprise. There have already been 186 posts, generating 3000 comments and bringing in 10 000 more fans since its creation. 
From the 29th of June to the 19th of July, the brand will also set up a game on its Facebook page allowing the guests to win a number of presents. The ranking of the best candidates will be shown to the public, encouraging the participants to be the most successful! 

hotelF1 therefore celebrates its 30th anniversary but one must not forget to thank and reward its customers and employees…Happy anniversary to everyone! 

Source:- Accor Related Posts
